text.text: How do I administer Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing?

text: To administer Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing, you need to go to Admin > Billing > Payers. You can post Medicaid Managed Care as primary, secondary, and/or tertiary.

text.text: Can you explain how to configure Medicaid Managed Care for a payer

text: To configure Medicaid Managed Care for a payer, you need to click on the Policies tab and then click Add a policy. You need to select Medicaid Managed Care in the Policy type field. You also need to select the appropriate indicator in the Electronic filing indicator field.

text.text: What steps are involved in setting up Medicaid Managed Care as a policy type in ZOLL Billing?

text: To set up Medicaid Managed Care as a policy type in ZOLL Billing, you need to: Click the Policies tab and then click Add a policy. Click on the Policy type field and select Medicaid Managed Care. Click the Electronic filing indicator field and select the appropriate indicator. After completing the rest of the necessary fields, click Save & close. The new policy will display in the list under the Policies heading.

text.text: How can I add a Medicaid Managed Care policy type to a payer in ZOLL Billing?

text: To add a Medicaid Managed Care policy type to a payer in ZOLL Billing, you need to: Click the Policies tab and then click Add a policy. Click on the Policy type field and select Medicaid Managed Care. Click the Electronic filing indicator field and select the appropriate indicator. In most cases the indicator will be "MC-Medicaid".

text.text: What should I do if the Medicaid Managed Care option is not showing up in ZOLL Billing's COB?

text: If you click the ' Medicaid Managed Care ' button in the COB and nothing shows as an option, you will need to go to Admin > Billing > Payers and administer your plans.

text.text: Can you guide me through configuring Medicaid Managed Care for a payer's benefit plan in ZOLL Billing?

text: When the "Medicaid Managed Care" policy type is configured for a payer, a tile on the COB will display right after the Medicaid tile. You cannot add a Medicaid and Medicaid Managed Care plan in the COB at the same time. Medicaid Managed Care can be posted as primary, secondary, and/or tertiary.

text.text: Is it possible to change an existing benefit plan to Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing?

text: Benefit plans cannot be changed to Medicaid Managed Care, instead you must disable the existing plan and add a new one.

text.text: How do I disable an existing benefit plan and add a new one for Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing?

text: To administer this new policy type, you must click Payers on the navigation bar, find the Medicaid payer on the list, and then click the payer name.

text.text: What is the significance of the Electronic filing indicator when setting up Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing?

text: The Electronic filing indicator is used on ANSI 837 and ANSI 837P (Professional) standard format used to electronically transmit health care claims. In most cases, the indicator will be "MC-Medicaid".

text.text: Can you provide step-by-step instructions on adding a policy type for Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing?

text:
Here are the steps to add a policy type for Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing:

1. Click **Payers** on the navigation bar.
2. On the **Payers** page, find and click the **payer name**.
3. Click the **Policies** tab.
4. Click **Add a policy**.
5. Enter the required information and then click **Save**.

text.text: Where can I find the option to select Medicaid Managed Care as a policy type in ZOLL Billing?

text: Medicaid Managed Care can be posted as primary, secondary, and/or tertiary. To administer this new policy type, you must click Payers on the navigation bar, find the Medicaid payer on the list, and then click the payer name. You can also find the option to select Medicaid Managed Care as a policy type in the Policies tab.

text.text: What are the requirements for adding Medicaid Managed Care as a policy type in ZOLL Billing?

text: To add Medicaid Managed Care as a policy type, you must click the Policies tab and then click Add a policy. In the Policy type field, select Medicaid Managed Care. In the Electronic filing indicator field, select the appropriate indicator. In most cases, the indicator will be "MC-Medicaid".

text.text: Are there any limitations or restrictions when configuring Medicaid Managed Care in ZOLL Billing?

text: When the "Medicaid Managed Care" policy type is configured for a payer, a tile on the COB will display right after the Medicaid tile. You cannot add a Medicaid and Medicaid Managed Care plan in the COB at the same time.

text.text: Can you explain how to ensure Medicaid Managed Care displays correctly

text: If you click the "Medicaid Managed Care" button in the COB and nothing shows as an option, you will need to go to Admin > Billing > Payers and administer your plans.

text.text: How do I verify that Medicaid Managed Care has been successfully configured for a payer

text: You can verify that Medicaid Managed Care has been successfully configured for a payer by looking for a tile on the COB right after the Medicaid tile. You cannot add a Medicaid and Medicaid Managed Care plan in the COB at the same time.

text.text: How to administer Medicaid Managed Care?

text: To administer Medicaid Managed Care, you need to add this type to the payers/benefit plan. In addition, benefit plans cannot be changed to Medicaid Managed Care, instead you must disable the existing plan and add a new one.

text.text: How to administer this new policy type

text: To administer this new policy type, you need to click Payers on the navigation bar, find the Medicaid payer on the list, and then click the payer name. You also need to click the Policies tab and click Add a policy. You then need to click on the Policy type field and select Medicaid Managed Care.
